VIRTUAL-CALL
opcode
(concept stage)

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div:
Workaround Execution contracts & Modified Solidity-compiler
(existing alternative)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 107px; margin-left: 540px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div: Standardize shard-blob data prefix to separate usage types (also of different L2s)

switch.text: Standardize shard-blob data prefix to separat...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 259px; margin-left: 540px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
State-roots:
Wait for shard blobs to be fully confirmed, then store pointers to resulting state-roots (sequencing results)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 132px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sequencer:
Buy shard data to make proposed transactions available

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 357px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sequencer 2:
Run Opti-Geth, compute state-roots, ensure previous shard data was confirmed, then submit state roots

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 234px; height: 1px; padding-top: 409px; margin-left: 559px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Transactions pay Sequencer, Sequencer pays Shard-blob Proposer for data slice

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 214px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Data Transport Layer (DTL):
Sync CTC data from Shard Node (may include confirmation delay if reorgs are not supported)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 282px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Opti-Geth (no network layer):
Sync transaction batches from DTL,
update State DB

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 52px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
P2P GossipSub, or direct RPC:
Transaction pool for sequencers

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 437px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Verifier:
Run Opti-Geth,
compare state-roots with shard data,
Submit fraud-proofs in case of mismatch

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 234px; height: 1px; padding-top: 494px; margin-left: 559px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Off-chain EIP1559-like fee structure

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 199px; height: 1px; padding-top: 169px; margin-left: 243px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Execution Manager Contract:
Entry-point for fraud-proofs.
Create ExecutionContext for VIRTUAL-CALL or regular CALL of opcode-safe calldata

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 199px; height: 1px; padding-top: 169px; margin-left: 33px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Bond Contract:
Sequencers stake to submit valid state roots

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 517px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
User:
interacts with L2 OptiGeth for Eth1-like RPC

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 199px; height: 1px; padding-top: 299px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Withdrawal: KZG shard data proof + wait for shard data to be fully confirmed (2/3 vote for beacon chain with confirmed shard header)
- Deposit: simple deposit log contract

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 199px; height: 1px; padding-top: 299px; margin-left: 243px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3rd party bridge contracts

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 182px; margin-left: 539px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Transaction Chain:
Enqueue transaction data in shard-shard-blob slices.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
